info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 8:26PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HARRISON...NORTHERN JEFFERSON...SOUTH CENTRAL COLUMBIANA AND SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Wintersville, or 11 miles northeast of Cadiz, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Steubenville, Wintersville, Bergholz, Amsterdam, Richmond, Irondale, Unionport, and Brentwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
